subtitle.en: Split PDF files by page range, fixed pages, or extract specific pages
subtitle.zh: 按页码范围、固定页数或提取指定页面分割 PDF 文件

description.en: Split books or documents into separate chapters
description.zh: 将书籍或文档分割为单独的章节

description.en: Extract and share only the pages you need
description.zh: 仅提取和分享您需要的页面

description.en: Break large PDFs into smaller, manageable files
description.zh: 将大型 PDF 分解为更小、更易管理的文件

description.en: Click or drag and drop to upload your PDF file
description.zh: 点击或拖放上传您的 PDF 文件

description.en: Choose how to split: by range, fixed pages, or extract
description.zh: 选择分割方式：按范围、固定页数或提取

description.en: Enter page ranges, pages per file, or pages to extract
description.zh: 输入页码范围、每文件页数或要提取的页码

description.en: Click Split PDF and download your files
description.zh: 点击分割 PDF 并下载您的文件

question.zh: 我的 PDF 文件安全吗？

answer.en: Yes, files are processed on our secure server and automatically deleted after processing.
answer.zh: 是的，文件在我们的安全服务器上处理，处理完成后自动删除。

question.en: What is the maximum file size?

answer.en: The tool can handle PDFs up to 50MB.
answer.zh: 该工具可以处理最大 50MB 的 PDF。

question.zh: 可以分割受密码保护的 PDF 吗？

answer.en: No, you need to remove the password protection before splitting.
answer.zh: 不可以，您需要在分割之前移除密码保护。

answer.en: Single file outputs as PDF. Multiple files are packaged as a ZIP archive.
answer.zh: 单个文件输出为 PDF。多个文件打包为 ZIP 压缩包。
